scl10.uk.ac.aber.users.readers

Class WarpReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • scl10.uk.ac.aber.users.readers.WarpReader

  • public final class WarpReader
extends java.lang.Object
    An immutable class for the reading and parsing of warp file data.
    Author:
    Scott Lockett

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double[][] as2DArray
      The associated warp as a 2 dimensional array of shift values
      private double[] asFlatArray
      The associated warp as a flat/ single array of shift values
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOGGER
      Logger for user information
      private java.awt.Dimension warpDimension
      The dimensions of the 2D warp

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WarpReader(double[][] warp)
      Creates a new warp reader object based on an already read warp object.
      WarpReader(java.io.File path)
      Creates a new warp reader object which reads in the warp file and allows the values to be accessed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private double[] convertToFlatArray()
      Converts the 2D warp array which is associated with this reader object into a single array or a flat version of the original 2D array.
      static double[][] readWarpFile(java.io.File warpPath)
      Reads in a warp file's path and the values from the file and returns a 2D array of the values within the file This method is static as it does not feel like it would be an instance specific method.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • WarpReader

        public WarpReader(@NonNull
                  double[][] warp)
        Creates a new warp reader object based on an already read warp object.
        Parameters:
        warp - The warp object which is to be read into the reader object. cannot be null.

      • WarpReader

        public WarpReader(@NonNull
                  java.io.File path)
        Creates a new warp reader object which reads in the warp file and allows the values to be accessed.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the warp file to be read. cannot be null.

    • Method Detail

      • convertToFlatArray

        private double[] convertToFlatArray()
        Converts the 2D warp array which is associated with this reader object into a single array or a flat version of the original 2D array.
        Returns:
        A flattened version of the warp array

      • readWarpFile

        public static double[][] readWarpFile(@NonNull
                                      java.io.File warpPath)
        Reads in a warp file's path and the values from the file and returns a 2D array of the values within the file This method is static as it does not feel like it would be an instance specific method.
        Parameters:
        warpPath - The path of the file which holds the warp values
        Returns:
        The values from the read warp file in a 2D array of doubles
